meanings.definition: A type of bony fish that belongs to the subclass Teleostei.
meanings.sent1: Teleosts are bony fish that are part of the Teleostei group.
meanings.sent2: I saw many teleosts swimming in the aquarium.
meanings.sent3: Why did the teleosts organize a talent show? To show off their scales!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of teleosts, she stood out like a colorful coral reef.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the teleosts sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any fish belonging to the subclass Teleostei.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a diverse collection of teleosts.
meanings.sent2: Teleosts are known for their unique fin shapes.
meanings.sent3: The teleosts threw a party to celebrate their underwater adventures.
meanings.sent4: Among the teleosts, he was the fastest swimmer, like a sleek torpedo.
meanings.sent5: The teleosts moved gracefully through the water, a mesmerizing sight.
